title: Early trick films [1898-1912]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography, Trick
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - History
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Appreciation
abstract: The House that Jack built (1900)--Upside down or the human flies (1898)--The Brahmin and the butterfly (1900)--The Motorist (1906)--The Magic screen (1912)--Dante's inferno (1912)--The Invisible thief (1909).
description: Compilation including "The House that Jack built" (dir. G.A. Smith); "Upside down or the human flies" (dir. R.W. Paul); "The Brahmin and the butterfly" (dir. Georges Melies); "The Motorist" (dir. R.W. Paul); "The Magic screen"; "Dante's inferno"; and in its entirety, "The Invisible thief".
